_header: It is bread from heaven come / Flesh & blood of Mary it nam
_description: A Song in honour of the Eucharist — seven quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Worchyp we bothe more & lesce / Crystes body in furme of bred’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
It is bred fro heuene camFleych & blod of Mary it
                    nam…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…& in heuene a place to geteThrow the vertu of this
                    bred
